text: aur ab unamen ka ek giroh kahane laga tha ki ai madeene vaalon ab (dushman ke muqaabalen mein ) tumhaare kaheen thikaana nahin to (behatar hai ki ab bhee) palat chalo aur unamen se kuchh log rasool se (ghar laut jaane kee) ijaazat maangane lage the ki hamaare ghar (mardon se) bilkul khaalee (gair mahaphooz) pade hue hain - haalaanki vah khaalee (gair mahaphooz) na the (balki) vah log to (isee bahaane se) bas bhaagana chaahate hain
